text: Hi, is there anything like Pygame in Julia? I created a simple connect 4 game and wanted to give it a window and some basic graphics, but I didn't find anything that's as accessible. So far my best bet seems to be SDL, but it's hard for me to wrap my mind around the C/C++ tutorials.
